actions.addPlayer: Add new players once at a time ...
actions.addMultiplePlayers: ... or a group of players using a file

run.willStop: This will stop the current tournament and allow users to register again. WARNING: This _will_ destroy the current bracket / groups
run.willStart: This will start the tournament and prevent users from registering.
run.willConfigure: The 'configure' button will allow you to configure your tournament further before starting it.

errors.notEnoughPlayers: Not enough players right now, you need to register more players.
errors.noPlayers: No players registered, there's no point in initiating the tournament

reporting.title: Reporting
reporting.describeReport: Please fill in the form and validate it in order to report the match.
reporting.warning: Clicking the confirmation button will unreport the match, permanently deleting any content (score, replays ...) related. This action can't be undone.
reporting.errorUnreportingMatch: An error has occurred when unreporting last match

errors.cantUnreportUnknownMatch: Can't report a match that does not exist for this bracket
errors.cannotUnreportIncompleteMatch: Unable to unreport a match that has not been played yet
errors.nextMatchAlreadyReported: The next match has already been played, you need to unreport it first in order to be able to unreport this one
errors.notAllPreviousMatchesAreComplete: There are matches before this one that need to be reported before you can report this one
errors.alreadyReported: This match has already been reported. If you want to edit it you must unreport and then report it again
errors.numberlessMatchNotAllowed: No match number was provided, unable to report.
errors.invalidScores: Please use integers when reporting score
errors.nextMatchDoesNotExist: Could not find the next match
errors.winnerMustHaveHigherScore: Winning player must have a higher score
errors.insufficientPrivileges: You are not allowed to do that
errors.errorUnreportingMatch: Service error. It can be temporary, try again in a few minutes and if the problem is still there you should get in touch w/ your admin or, if none is present, tweet the main dev (@ToodleTM).
errors.tournamentLocked: Tournament is currently locked (it probably has a follow-up tournament set up)

misc.fileMustBeCSV: file needs to be a CSV file

error.noSuchTournament: No such tournament has been registered, check your URL or go back to the main page to create a new tournament.
error.serverError: A server error has occurred, wait for a bit to retry and if nothing gets better, get in touch with the admin
error.notACSVFile: File does not seem to be a CSV file
error.noNameField: No Column for player nicks in this file. Remember that the 1st line of your CSV should define the columns. A valid 1st line here is : 'name, faction'

update.fail: Something went wrong updating this tournament.

register.noPlayers: No registered players at the moment

errors.noDuplicateNick: A player with that name is already registered
errors.incorrectNick: Invalid nick (either empty or more than 19 characters long)
errors.registrationLocked: You can't enter this tournament, registration is locked
errors.noSuchTournament: No such tournament has been registered, check your URL or go back to the main page to create a new tournament.

common.errorFindingMatchesToReport: An error occurred while looking up matches to be reported.

bracket.header: This is the current state of tournament
bracket.tournamentNotRunningWarning: Tournament is not currently running, please come back later!
